product.name: Schoolhouse Pendant Fixture, 12 Inch Black Finish with Milk Glass Adjustable Mid Century Ceiling Pendant Lighting, Pendant Light Fixtures for Kitchen Hallway Entrywa Dining Room
product.description: The schoolhouse pendant light fixtures, built in brass gold finish and milky white glass lampshade(made of premium hand-blown glass), performs very well in light transmittance, refraction effect, hardness and texture. Mid century modern style and elegant design, creates a warm bright and comfortable atmosphere.
product.bullet_points:
• 【Pendant Fixtures & Schoolhouse Style】 This pendant light is perfect for vintage farmhouse and industrial decors. A matte black base complements the opaque glass shade and heightens the schoolhouse look of this ceiling light, The milk glass filters strong light, making the light soft and caring for your eyes, creates a romantic atmosphere to your home.
• 【Standard E26 Socket】The pendant light built in 1 x E26 heat-resistance socket (MAX 60W). Compatible with with a variety of bulbs, including Incandescent, LED, CFL, halogen. The pendant light is fully dimmable when using with a dimmable bulb and compatible dimmer switch. (Note: Bulbs and Dimmer Switch are NOT Included)
• 【Perfect size & Wide applications】 Diameter: 12inch /30cm, Canopy Diameter: 5.5inch /14cm, Lamp Height: 70inch /180cm，The hanging chain is 59 inch /150cm and the length can be adjusted. The pendant light perfect for Hallway, Entry, Porch, Mudroom, Stairwell, Kitchen, Closet, Kids Room, Dining Room, Bedroom, Living Room.
• 【Premium Quality & Intuitive Installation】The pendant light fixture is made of top-grade durable metal and milk glass, no need to worry about rust, corrosion or fading. Hardwired and receptacles are constructed with high-quality materials and circuitry for truly long-lasting, high-quality use. This schoolhouse pendant light fixture includes all mounting hardware and instructions for quick and easy installation, saving you the hassle of finding compatible accessories.
• 【BinoBro Service】1 pendant light, 1 tool set (2 screws and 3 wire connectors), 1 instruction manual,Friendly customer service. No matter what problem you have with our lights, please feel free to contact us via Amazon message box, we will try our best to help you within 24 hours.
